LanguageData.InfestationBait_BaitChanceTooltip: The chance in % for the bait to be used as location in case an infestation spawns.
LanguageData.InfestationBait_AcceptanceReportFailed_e: Only one bait allowed per map!
LanguageData.InfestationBait_AcceptanceReportFailed_R: Must be placed below Overhead Mountain!
LanguageData.InfestationBait_Error_FoundMoreThanOneIn: Error:Found more than one Bait building in save file! This should not have happened.Will not load any more than one.
